content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 12: The Nepali Army has urged all not to believe in misleading and fake news. Issuing a press release today, the Directorate of the Public Relations and Information of the NA urged this, saying different types of criticism, opinion and analysis have been made involving the NA in this current situation

Issuing a press release today, the Directorate of the Public Relations and Information of the NA urged this, saying different types of criticism, opinion and analysis have been made involving the NA in this current situation

title: NA urges all not to believe in fake news
